3fc7a9358189.description: A weekly publication Prompting Writers To Write. New writing prompt every Monday. Submissions due on Friday. Collected stories published on Saturday morning.
3fc7a9358189.name: The Weekly Knob
3fc7a9358189.shortDescription: A weekly publication Prompting Writers To Write.

paragraphs.name: 9bb9
paragraphs.text: “I, uh, I want you to know I’m here for you, Paralee. I know it won’t change nothin’ but I can listen if you wanna talk… about anything… anything at all,” Caroline coaxed, tenderly. She was holding the crumpled ball of April in her cupped hands like an offering.

paragraphs.name: f8be
paragraphs.text: Paralee and Caroline get a free calendar and a brand new friendship
This is beautiful and the mark of a great friend.
paragraphs.name: 3e2a

paragraphs.text: This was one of the most powerful phrases of the story. It reminds me of the movie, Collateral Beauty, which I…

bbe7a42f2b27.title: I felt every bit of this story — the angst, the pain, the uncertainty…the denial, as if I was in…

paragraphs.text: I felt every bit of this story — the angst, the pain, the uncertainty…the denial, as if I was in the room with them. Excellent!
paragraphs.name: b203

87e6c7a4aae7.title: Paralee’s date was a day in April, and absolutely the only day she forbade herself to forget as…

paragraphs.text: Paralee’s date was a day in April, and absolutely the only day she forbade herself to forget as long as she lived, lest it come upon her again.
paragraphs.name: fed7

paragraphs.text: I love this line.

51b57513710.name: S Lynn Knight
51b57513710.bio: I’m just a girl whose dreams were predicted to be nothing more than "pipe dreams” — so tell me, what’s there to lose?

daa0aa08c599.bio: Trying to find my way again.
